for i in range(int(input())):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    res = 1
    n -= 1
    k -= 1
    for i in range(1, k + 1):
        res = res * (n - k + i)
        res = res // i
    print(res)

for i in range(int(input())):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    num = 1
    for i in range(1, k):
        num *= n - k + i
        num //= i
    print(num)

T = int(input())
for i in range(0, T):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    ans = 1
    for j in range(1, k):
        ans *= n - k + j
        ans //= j
    print(int(ans))
